main.name: Gregory Mujica
main.description: Specialized in microservices and development architectures
main.bio: As a senior full-stack JavaScript developer with a passion for innovation and delivering high-quality code, I believe in the power of networking and collaboration within our industry. With over 8 years of experience, I have had the privilege of working on a wide range of projects, from social network platforms for athletes and sports competitions to e-commerce and marketplace solutions. My technical skills span technologies such as NodeJS (NestJS, Express), ReactJS, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, GitLab, microservices and more. I have a proven track record of successfully leading the development of complex projects, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and efficient web applications. I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to expand my skill set, and I actively participate in tech communities and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

work.title: Backend Developer
work.description: At Dacodes, I played a pivotal role as a Backend Developer in the creation of the asdeporte social network. Utilizing a robust tech stack including Node.js, NestJS, GraphQL, and Apache Kafka, I designed and implemented API architecture, enabling seamless communication through Apache Kafka. I managed GitLab for codebase and version control, and led the transition to an advanced microservices structure, adopting NestJS for microservices development. Collaboration and code optimization were key, resulting in impactful contributions to athlete engagement and sports technology. Key Skills: nodejs (nest), typescript, postgres, docker, typeorm, graphql, apache kafka, gitlab, microservices, scrum, jira, aws, tdd, ddd, typescript.

work.title: Full-stack Developer
work.description: During my tenure at Grupo Avanza, I significantly impacted the Falabella Insurance projects as a Backend Developer. I spearheaded the creation of an API tailored for bulk fee returns, streamlining the refund process and leveraging AWS services for efficiency. The integration of Lambda Functions, CI/CD pipelines, and technologies like Terraform and Docker facilitated seamless project execution. Cross-functional collaboration, database management, and infrastructure configuration were key aspects, leading to successful project deliveries and enriched expertise. Key Skills:  nodejs (express - koa), typescript, postgres, docker, mongodb, microservices, git, jest, jira.

work.title: Backend Developer
work.description: Backend developer in charge of creating, modifying and optimizing Rest APIs for the Falabella Insurance Client Headquarters: Chile, Colombia, Peru, Projects worked: FPAY: Rest API for the massive return of payments to bank clients. LIA: Authentication and data validation system for your clients. Among my tasks were from the development and management of databases, as well as the development of unit tests.Technologies: NodeJS (Express, Koa), Docker, PostgresSQL, MongoDB, Git (Bitbucket), Jets (Unit Test), JIRA.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: At Soaint, my role as a Full-Stack Developer encompassed impactful contributions to both backend and frontend development. I designed APIs for bulk fee returns, ensuring seamless project management through Scrum, JIRA, GitLab, and CI/CD pipelines. My proficiency in Node.js, NestJS, ReactJS, and AWS services enhanced backend and frontend solutions, optimizing user experiences. My engagement showcased versatility, collaboration, and innovation across projects. Key Skills: reactjs (hooks), redux, styled components, azure, git, react google recaptcha v3, browserstack, nodejs, sql server, codescan.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: At Evol, I excelled as a Frontend Developer, delivering user-centric front-end applications using React.js and Material UI. I provided essential backend support for the ODC project, streamlining credit card origination. My versatility extended to backend support and involvement in the quotation application. My proficiency in React.js, Redux, .Net Core, and AWS services resulted in engaging interfaces, streamlined development, and improved user experiences. Key Skills: reactjs, redux, axios, materialui, git, azure devops, sonarqube, gitlab, sql server, .core(crud), nodejs (express)

work.title: Functional analyst - QA
work.description: Prepare the functional analysis of new applications for different organizations, as well as update and improve existing ones; that is, it must control, analyze and supervise the functional development of computer applications, ensuring their correct exploitation and optimal performance. Development of diagrams of operations and design of applications at the level of mockups. Currently, the service offered is for the Tgestiona Company and in turn the assigned projects of Telefonica of Perú Technologies used: Lucidchart (development of diagrams and mockups), Figma (development of mockups), Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Agile Scrum methodology.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: My role at IT Secure involved meticulous preparation of functional analyses, fostering efficient application evolution across organizations. By employing tools like Lucidchart and Figma, I communicated complex ideas effectively. Embracing Agile Scrum, I adapted to distinct contexts, optimizing digital landscapes and ensuring peak performance of applications. Key Skills: lucidchart, figma, scrum, sql server.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: As a Frontend Developer at Aviant Travel, I crafted engaging user experiences using React.js and Material UI. I provided crucial backend support for the credit card origination project, ensuring seamless workflow. My contribution extended to designing the company website, showcasing proficiency in HTML, CSS, Redux, and Git. My engagements enriched digital presence and user interactions. Key Skills: reactjs, redux, git, materialui.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: At Grupo Red M, I showcased Full-Stack Developer expertise by leading the development of CRM brainy app modules. I created responsive interfaces, managed PostgreSQL databases, and used Apache for deployment. My involvement highlighted adaptability, technological proficiency, and contribution to streamlined operations. Key Skills: php, bootstrap 3, javascript

work.title: Project Leader / Full stack developer
work.description: In my role as a Full-Stack Developer at Spartan Tech´s, I demonstrated leadership by spearheading the POS project, utilizing Yii2 and Enyo for PHP and JavaScript development. I integrated ERP systems, optimized databases, and adhered to MVC pattern for structured code. My versatility spanned from responsive interfaces to efficient databases, reflecting my commitment to impactful development practices. Key Skills: php (yii2), enyo, java, nginx, apache tomcat, postgres, css, mvc, jquery, ajax.

projects.title: Event manager Nestjs microservice
projects.category: A nestjs event manager with auth (jwt), docker and postgres

projects.title: Event manager Reactjs frontend
projects.category: A Reactjs event manager with material-ui and microservices integration

projects.title: Ecomerce express API
projects.category: Node MongoDB eCommerce Rest API using Stripe payment method. Node.js (Express) shopping API with users type authentications. This Rest API consists of a CRUD and user authentication with their types, regular user and admin user, the latter being the rol with the most privileges.

projects.title: React Cryptoverse App
projects.category: A simple real-time web application for monitoring and consulting various types of cryptocurrencies and news. This application was developed with: ReactJS, Hooks, Axios.

projects.title: Proyect Ticket Manager
projects.category: A simple task ticket management tool developed to support the management of a project using agile methodologies such as Scrum.

projects.title: React Fitebase Chat
projects.category: A simple chat app built with ReactJS and Firebase

projects.title: Express Authentication API
projects.category: A simple authentication API developed with nodeJS (Express Framework), MongoDB Atlas with Mongoose for the development of the database system. It also implements security and sessions already started. All this implemented with JWT (Json Web Token)

projects.title: Omnifood
projects.category: A simple web page for food delivery app

testimonials.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.
The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
